## message-handler package

Provides a [plugin](./message-handler.messagehandler.md) for the [Agent](./core.agent.md) that implements interface.

## Classes

| Class                                                                 | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [AbstractMessageHandler](./message-handler.abstractmessagehandler.md) | An abstract class for creating [MessageHandler](./message-handler.messagehandler.md) plugins                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    |
| [Message](./message-handler.message.md)                               | <p>A class implementing .</p><p>This is used by [MessageHandler](./message-handler.messagehandler.md).</p>                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| [MessageHandler](./message-handler.messagehandler.md)                 | <p>A Veramo agent plugin that implements methods.</p><p>This plugin is meant to chain together multiple other implementations.</p><p>When handling a message, the message is passed from one handler to the next, and each handler in the chain can decide if it is able to interpret the message.</p><p>If the message can be processed by a handler it is returned as an . If the message cannot be processed by any of the handlers, an error is thrown.</p> |
